title: Reorder navigation so Order History appears below My Account

requirements.summary: Reorder header navigation so "Order History" appears directly after "My Account" wherever both are shown together (especially the mobile slide-out menu), without changing routes or labels.
acceptanceCriteria: In the mobile slide-out menu in `frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav.tsx`, the "Order History" button is listed below the "My Account" button (and not above it).
No existing routes or navigation behaviors change ("Order History" still navigates to `/order-history`; "My Account" still opens the account/auth modal).
User-facing labels remain in English (e.g., "My Account", "Order History").

file_operations.description: Adjust the menu item rendering order so the "Order History" action is positioned immediately after the "My Account" action in the mobile slide-out menu (and any other UI where both appear together), keeping labels in English and preserving existing navigation targets/handlers.
